sentences.english: For example, no any examplebut affine hyperspheres is known so far.
sentences.chinese: 例如，人们甚至不知道是否有非完备仿射球的例子。

sentences.english: In this paper, the reducibility of affine hyperplane arrangements is discussed by using the matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用矩阵方法讨论仿射超平面构形的可约性。

sentences.english: Quantized affine transformation T constitutes the fractal block coding of the image block.
sentences.chinese: 量化后的仿射变换T构成了图像块的分形块编码。

sentences.english: We reveal that the uncertain coefficients of the 2-D polytopes are of linear affine property.
sentences.chinese: 我们揭示多胞型二维多项式的系数具有线性仿射特性。

sentences.english: The subaffine elastica is the critical point of the total squared subaffine curvature functional.
sentences.chinese: 次仿射弹性曲线是全平方次仿射曲率泛函的临界点。

sentences.english: The subaffine elastica is the critical point of the total squared subaffine curvature functional.
sentences.chinese: 次仿射弹性曲线是全平方次仿射曲率泛函的临界点。

sentences.english: The reducibility of affine hyperplane arrangements is discussed by using the matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 用矩阵方法讨论仿射超平面构形的可约性。

sentences.english: This paper addresses the high order sliding mode control problem of nonlinear affine systems.
sentences.chinese: 研究非线性仿射系统的高阶滑模控制问题。

sentences.english: This paper considers the robust stabilization problem of an affine nonlinear uncertain systems.
sentences.chinese: 考虑了仿射非线性不确定系统的鲁棒镇定性。

sentences.english: A new tree height measurement is presented, which is based on affine reconstructive.
sentences.chinese: 论文提出了一种基于仿射重构的树高测量方法。

sentences.english: An affine transformation is one in which parallel lines remain parallel after the transformation.
sentences.chinese: 仿射转换指的是平行线在转换后还保持平行。

sentences.english: Originally, the distortion between infrared and visible images is affine.
sentences.chinese: 可见光和红外图像配准时的变换为仿射变换。

sentences.english: The same LM algorithm is used to track the affine deformation parameters of the target.
sentences.chinese: 使用LM优化方法跟踪目标的仿射运动参数。

definition: field of complex numbers (math.), usually denoted by C
eigenvalue (math.)/also written 特徵值|特征值
